actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to encourage greater participation in Federal elections by designating Election Day a national holiday.

summary.text: Designates Election Day, the first Tuesday after the first Monday in November in every even numbered year, a legal public holiday.

titles.title: A bill to encourage greater participation in Federal elections by designating Election Day a national holiday.
